content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) fueled with coal, extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) fueled with coal, used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) fueled with coal, extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) fueled with coal, used for smelting operations.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to inserting non-existent items.

### Errors due to full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and other entities that rely on storage space.

### Errors due to furnaces being full
- Monitor furnace output inventories and clear them when full to prevent halting of production processes.

### Errors due to no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt to maintain continuous production.
